description: Washington, D.C. marijuana grower Samson Paisley displays his D.C. Grower's Cup trophy, his first-place hybrid strain and seeds at the D.C. ComfyTree CannaBazaar in June. (Photo by Karen Mawdsley | News21)
Cannabis entrepreneurs and vendors showcased their products at the Washington, D.C. ComfyTree CannaBazaar in June. (Photo by Karen Mawdsley | News21)
Members of NORML's Washington, D.C. chapter sit at a table at the ComfyTree CannaBazaar in June. (Photo by Karen Mawdsley | News21)
A worker from Montgomery Hydroponics, based in Silver Spring, Maryland, displays home grow equipment at the Washington, D.C. ComfyTree CannaBazaar in June. (Photo by Karen Mawdsley | News21)
Samson Paisley, a renowned seed sharer in Washington, D.C., displays his seeds at the Washington, D.C. ComfyTree CannaBazaar in June. (Photo by Karen Mawdsley | News21)
